channel.title: Areas of activity on InfoProBusiness
channel.description: Recent content in Areas of activity on InfoProBusiness

item.title: DEVELOPMENT AND OPERATION OF INTEGRATED MARKETPLACES
item.description: Creating marketplaces that include information from many diverse sources. Organization of effective multi-criteria search using dynamic dictionaries. Creating an informative display of heterogeneous data

item.title: SOFTWARE DEVELOPMENT
item.description: We have extensive experience in creating software for WEB platforms, database management systems, application software complexes and analytical systems

item.title: VERIFICATION OF COUNTERPARTIES
item.description: A set of services for checking and evaluating the reliability of the counterparty. The product provides up-to-date and archived information about companies and entrepreneurs, visualizes all current and historical legal ties, verifies affiliation and identifies final beneficiaries
